thing-type.label: HS-WD100+ Scene Capable Wall Dimmer Switch
thing-type.description: Scene Capable Wall Dimmer Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtHS-WD100+ is a Z-Wave wall dimmer that’s designed for wireless on-off-dim control of connected dimmable lighting loads. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTap the paddle of your new HomeSeer switch to begin the inclusion process. This will take a few moments to complete. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtSingle click and release the rocker switch. </p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Orientation
parameter.description: Controls the on/off orientation of the rocker switch

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Remote Dimming Level Increment
parameter.description: Number of levels (1-99) to change dimming each step when controlled remotely<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis is the step value that the dimmer level is incremented or decremented for each step duration when controlled remotely.</p&gt <p&gt(This parameter was added in firmware version 5.14)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Remote Dimming Step Duration
parameter.description: Time interval (in tens of ms) of brightness change when controlled remotely<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSelect time interval to move to the next brightness level. The larger the number, the slower the adjustment to dim levels. </p&gt <p&gt(This parameter was added in firmware version 5.14)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Local Dimming Level Increment
parameter.description: Number of levels (1-99) to change dimming each step when controlled locally<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis is the step value that the dimmer level is incremented or decremented for each step duration when controlled locally.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_2
parameter.label: 10: Local Dimming Step Duration
parameter.description: Time interval (in tens of ms) of brightness change when controlled locally<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSelect time interval to move to the next brightness level. The larger the number, the slower the adjustment to dim levels. </p&gt</p&gt
